description: a list of specific objects that gets references from mansion.gates.schema.json

sayWhenAddedDynamically.line1: 20 years ago...that time the grounds keeper legendarily dispatched the demon to another dimension
sayWhenAddedDynamically.line2: but no one even knows his phone number?
sayWhenAddedDynamically.line3: I hear that he gets called in automatically, whenever the pitch gets too wet or dry
